thread.title: BSNL Recruitment through GATE 2017 JTO Apply Online (2510 Vacancies)
thread.title_full: BSNL Recruitment through GATE 2017 JTO Apply Online (2510 Vacancies)

author: noreply@blogger.com (dinesh prabhu)
title: BSNL Recruitment through GATE 2017 JTO Apply Online (2510 Vacancies)
text:
2510 in 27 BSNL Circles 18 to 30 Years as on 31/01/2017 E-1 ₹ 16400 – 40500/- (IDA) 
Educational Qualification: Engineering Graduate Degree (B.E. / B.Tech) in Telecom / Electronics/ Radio / Computer / Electrical / Information Technology / Instrumentation Engineering or equivalent (OR) Post Graduate (M.Sc) in Electronics or Computer Science from Recognized University / Institute. 
Selection Process : The mode of selection is through VALID GATE SCORE-2017 which has been conducted by IIT Roorkee, in the month of February 2017. The candidates should apply and appear GATE 2017 Exam in appropriate Papers (CS / EC / EE / IN). 
Application Fee : ₹ 500/- for OC / OBC Category Candidates; ₹ 300/- for SC / ST Category Candidates. The fee shall be paid through online mode i.e. Internet Banking, Credit Card, Debit Card only. 
How to Apply: Eligible Graduate Engineers Apply Online through BSNL Website from 06/03/2017 to 06/04/2017 . 
Help Desk : For any query, the applicant may contact 01123352491; fax no. 011-23356657, BSNL Corporate Office, New Delhi during office.
